AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute.title: Allow Partially Trusted Callers Attribute
AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute.description: Allows an assembly to be called by partially trusted code. Without this declaration, only fully trusted callers are able to use the assembly. This class cannot be inherited.

IPermission.title: I Permission
IPermission.description: Defines methods implemented by permission types.

0bf431b1.name: Copy
0bf431b1.description: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.

9e746405.name: Demand
9e746405.description: Throws a  at run time if the security requirement is not met.

332f8d5b.name: Intersect
332f8d5b.description: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

8c8ecfa0.name: IsSubsetOf
8c8ecfa0.description: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

48ec7b71.name: Union
48ec7b71.description: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

IStackWalk.title: I Stack Walk
IStackWalk.description: Manages the stack walk that determines whether all callers in the call stack have the required permissions to access a protected resource.

e798253b.name: Assert
e798253b.description: Asserts that the calling code can access the resource identified by the current permission object, even if callers higher in the stack have not been granted permission to access the resource.

f8a6c417.name: Demand
f8a6c417.description: Determines at run time whether all callers in the call stack have been granted the permission specified by the current permission object.

92982382.name: Deny
92982382.description: Causes every  for the current object that passes through the calling code to fail.

065587b0.name: PermitOnly
065587b0.description: Causes every  for all objects except the current one that passes through the calling code to fail, even if code higher in the call stack has been granted permission to access other resources.

PermissionSet.title: Permission Set
PermissionSet.description: Represents a collection that can contain many different types of permissions.

0739f1c4.name: AddPermission
0739f1c4.description: Adds a specified permission to the .

756c4902.name: Assert
756c4902.description: Declares that the calling code can access the resource protected by a permission demand through the code that calls this method, even if callers higher in the stack have not been granted permission to access the resource. Using  can create security vulnerabilities.

SecureString.title: Secure String
SecureString.description: Represents text that should be kept confidential, such as by deleting it from computer memory when no longer needed. This class cannot be inherited.
